name: Introduction to Advanced Calculus for Engineers and Physical Scientists 1
description: Theory of real numbers, functions of one variable, sequences, limits, continuity and differentiation; continuity and differentiability of functions of several variables. MAA 4102 is not recommended for those who plan to do graduate work in mathematics; these students should take MAA 4211. Credit will be given for, at most, one of MAA 4102, MAA 4211 and MAA 5104.
